  • Uses of UserRolesRetrieveStrategy in org.keycloak.storage.ldap.mappers.membership

    Classes in org.keycloak.storage.ldap.mappers.membership that implement UserRolesRetrieveStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    UserRolesRetrieveStrategy.GetRolesFromUserMemberOfAttribute
    Roles of user will be loaded from LDAP based on "memberOf" attribute of our user
    static class 
    UserRolesRetrieveStrategy.LoadRolesByMember
    Roles of user will be retrieved by sending LDAP query to retrieve all roles where "member" is our user
    static class 
    UserRolesRetrieveStrategy.LoadRolesByMemberRecursively
    Extension specific to Active Directory.
